name: ObservableObjectPublisher
desc: A publisher that publishes changes from observable objects.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an observable object publisher instance.

items.name: typealias Output
items.desc: The kind of values published by this publisher.

items.name: typealias Failure
items.desc: The kind of errors this publisher might publish.

items.name: func send()
items.desc: Sends the changed value to the downstream subscriber.
